title: sholla vallEnO maraiyOdi
sahitya:
sholla vallEnO maraiyOdi paravu malar pAdan sItA nAthan shrI rAma dUtan perumai	


anupallavi

  vallavaraippOlum vazhi marutta Or vAnaramE idu kELum nalla urai 
shonnEn aNNanadu perumai jnyAnam vandavuDan vazhiviTTu mILum


caraNam 1    teLLiiya pavana dEvanukkum anjanA dEvi tanakkum maganAha udittAn
tihamozhi kadiravan kaLiru tilakamODu kaniyena manamODu piDittAn 
Arum raivadAna paDi kadiril mEvi Ayirattil onbadu paDittAn
Ahiri tannil munamE giri uruvavumAkki nAradanin mamataiyai piDittAn
    caraNam 2   tEDi vanam vanda shrI rAmacandran enum daivam pugazhinukkAnavai yuTrAn
tirumagaL azhiyinai kaNDu annai tarum ciranjIvi enum Ashiyum peTrAn
nADi purudumoru vELai tIyaiyiDa rAvaNan nagar tanai tIyiDa uTrAn
rAma rAma jayarAma rAma jayarAma ena nAmamum kaTrA
    caraNam 3    iyyan magizha ivayyam magizha perum aDarum sanjIvi malaiyODum vandAn
anaivarum uyir pera Anandam tanaiyura attaruNam iyyanadu pAdam paNindAn
uiya vagai arriya ninru ninrulava uLLoLi tannoDum engum uvandAn
urangi iDariDu munnaiyum valiyura OraruL endanukku uDanukkuDan IndAn
